title: STK Niagara Fallsview has multiple menu categories
statement: STK Niagara Fallsview offers A La Carte, Market Salads & Starters, Beverage Menu, Cocktails, Wine List, Wine by the Glass, and Bubbles menu sections.

citations.quote: A La Carte Market Salads & Starters Beverage Menu Cocktails (2.5 Ounces) Wine List Wine by the Glass (6 Ounces) Bubbles
